name: Best Ever Vegan Waffles
description: How to make the Best Ever Vegan Waffles! Nice and crispy on the outside, soft and fluffy on the inside.

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat waffle iron according to manufacturer's instructions.
recipeInstructions.name: Preheat waffle iron according to manufacturer's instructions.

recipeInstructions.text: Make the Flax Eggs: In a small bowl, combine the ground flax and water. Stir, and set aside to thicken.
recipeInstructions.name: Make the Flax Eggs: In a small bowl, combine the ground flax and water. Stir, and set aside to thicken.

recipeInstructions.text: Make the Vegan Buttermilk: If your milk is cold, warm it for a minute in the microwave, otherwise it will cause the coconut oil to harden in the batter. In a large measuring cup or bowl, measure 3 1/2 cups of soy milk. Add the apple cider vinegar, stir a little with a spoon and set aside to curdle.
recipeInstructions.name: Make the Vegan Buttermilk: If your milk is cold, warm it for a minute in the microwave, otherwise it will cause the coconut oil to harden in the batter. In a large measuring cup or bowl, measure 3 1/2 cups of soy milk. Add the apple cider vinegar, stir a little with a spoon and set aside to curdle.

recipeInstructions.text: In a large bowl, whisk together the flours, baking powder, salt and sugar.
recipeInstructions.name: In a large bowl, whisk together the flours, baking powder, salt and sugar.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the flax eggs, vegan buttermilk, melted coconut oil and vanilla to the dry ingredients. Stir until just combined with a large wooden spoon, being careful not to over mix. The batter should be fairly thick, if it's too runny add a few tablespoons more of flour. If it's too thick, add a little more water.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the flax eggs, vegan buttermilk, melted coconut oil and vanilla to the dry ingredients. Stir until just combined with a large wooden spoon, being careful not to over mix. The batter should be fairly thick, if it's too runny add a few tablespoons more of flour. If it's too thick, add a little more water.

recipeInstructions.text: Spray waffle iron with oil (unless your waffle iron is non-stick). Pour the recommended amount of batter onto hot waffle iron, and cook until the waffle is golden brown on both sides.
recipeInstructions.name: Spray waffle iron with oil (unless your waffle iron is non-stick). Pour the recommended amount of batter onto hot waffle iron, and cook until the waffle is golden brown on both sides.

recipeInstructions.text: Serve immediately, or keep in a warm oven (200 degrees F) until ready to serve. Top with fresh berries, coconut whip, vegan butter, maple syrup and anything else you desire!
